channel.title: Roommates Wanted (Trophy Dark two-shot)
channel.description:
Please allow the first 48 hours for individuals who have not been in a game I've run/played with before.
**Roommates Wanted (Trophy Dark two-shot), October 21 and 28, 8:30 AM-12:00 PM EDT** A modern horror scenario by Dark Liquid Games, using Trophy Dark rules.
*This advertisement is about tenants.* *Elderly recluse seeking roommates for shared costs and company.* *Large estate within 10 minutes of city centre, all amenities and bills included.* *The grounds and estate are free to use as you see fit except of course for my bedroom, and the basement, which are STRICTLY OFF LIMITS.*
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
This is a **two-shot** - only sign up if you are able to make it to **both** sessions. You must RSVP to each session. [date=2022-10-21 time=08:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2022-10-21 time=12:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NCzSMj0OyVRfGEZfx-w [date=2022-10-28 time=08:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2022-10-28 time=12:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NCzSfVTZ19000ayhV5W
Play will be conducted on Zoom, each session is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours, with breaks approximately every hour. Sessions will be recorded for Keeper review, and only posted on YouTube with all participants' permission.

item.title: Roommates Wanted (Trophy Dark two-shot)
item.dc:creator: @Mads
item.description:
@Mads wrote:

Please allow the first 48 hours for individuals who have not been in a game I’ve run/played with before.

Roommates Wanted (Trophy Dark two-shot), October 21 and 28, 8:30 AM-12:00 PM EDT
A modern horror scenario by Dark Liquid Games, using Trophy Dark rules.

This advertisement is about tenants.
Elderly recluse seeking roommates for shared costs and company.
Large estate within 10 minutes of city centre, all amenities and bills included.
The grounds and estate are free to use as you see fit except of course for my bedroom, and the basement, which are STRICTLY OFF LIMITS.

The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be in play and safety tools (Script Change and X-Card) will be in use.

This is a two-shot - only sign up if you are able to make it to both sessions. You must RSVP to each session.
2022-10-21T12:30:00Z → 2022-10-21T16:00:00Z
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NCzSMj0OyVRfGEZfx-w
2022-10-28T12:30:00Z → 2022-10-28T16:00:00Z
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NCzSfVTZ19000ayhV5W

Play will be conducted on Zoom, each session is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours, with breaks approximately every hour. Sessions will be recorded for Keeper review, and only posted on YouTube with all participants’ permission.
